pullrequest.title: Configure distributed sim from command line

content.raw:
I believe I found what is going on. The performer affinity service call is timing out, which causes everything to get in a weird state. I’m going to try to figure out what that call is failing, but also add some protection to keep it from getting in this state.

```
[Dbg] [SimulationRunner.cc:372] Initializing network configuration
[Dbg] [NetworkManagerPrimary.cc:91] Attempting to register secondary [5aa6960d/control]
[Dbg] [NetworkManagerSecondary.cc:158] NetworkManagerSecondary::OnControl
[Dbg] [NetworkManagerPrimary.cc:98] Peer initialized [5aa6960d]
[Dbg] [NetworkManagerPrimary.cc:91] Attempting to register secondary [e5946b18/control]
[Dbg] [NetworkManagerSecondary.cc:158] NetworkManagerSecondary::OnControl
[Dbg] [NetworkManagerPrimary.cc:98] Peer initialized [e5946b18]


[Wrn] [SyncManager.cc:139] Failed to set performer affinities for 5aa6960d (service call timed out)
[Wrn] [SyncManager.cc:139] Failed to set performer affinities for e5946b18 (service call timed out)
[Dbg] [SimulationRunner.cc:372] Initializing network configuration
[Dbg] [SimulationRunner.cc:372] Initializing network configuration
[Dbg] [SyncManager.cc:193] Secondary [e5946b18] waiting for affinity assignment.
[Dbg] [SyncManager.cc:193] Secondary [5aa6960d] waiting for affinity assignment.
```
content.html:
I believe I found what is going on. The performer affinity service call is timing out, which causes everything to get in a weird state. I’m going to try to figure out what that call is failing, but also add some protection to keep it from getting in this state.

[Dbg] [SimulationRunner.cc:372] Initializing network configuration

[Dbg] [NetworkManagerPrimary.cc:98] Peer initialized [e5946b18]

[Wrn] [SyncManager.cc:139] Failed to set performer affinities for e5946b18 (service call timed out)
